question: What is the cost of the basic plan?
reply: The basic plan is $9.99 per month, which includes access to core features and limited integrations.

question: Are there any discounts for annual subscriptions?
reply: Yes, we offer a 20% discount on annual subscriptions for all our plans.

question: Can I change my subscription plan at any time?
reply: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time from your account settings.

question: Is there a free trial available?
reply: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new users.

question: Do you offer refunds?
reply: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you are not satisfied with our service.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
reply: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings at any time.

question: Can I use Foxi with Google Calendar?
reply: Yes, Foxi integrates seamlessly with Google Calendar for easy scheduling and task management.

question: Does Foxi work with Slack?
reply: Yes, you can integrate Foxi with Slack to receive notifications and updates directly in your channels.

question: How do I connect Foxi with Trello?
reply: To connect Foxi with Trello, go to the integrations page in your settings and follow the instructions to link your accounts.

question: Is there an API for custom integrations?
reply: Yes, we provide an API that allows you to create custom integrations with Foxi.

question: Can I sync Foxi with my email?
reply: Currently, we do not support email integration, but this feature is on our roadmap for future releases.

question: Does Foxi support Zapier?
reply: Yes, Foxi integrates with Zapier, allowing you to connect with over 2,000 apps and automate your workflows.

question: What are the main features of Foxi?
reply: Foxi includes in-app messaging, project management, time tracking, customizable dashboards, and more.

question: How do I use the in-app messaging feature?
reply: In-app messaging allows you to communicate with your team directly within Foxi. Simply navigate to the messaging tab to start a conversation.

question: Can I customize my dashboard?
reply: Yes, you can customize your dashboard by adding, removing, and rearranging widgets to fit your workflow.

question: How does the time tracking feature work?
reply: Time tracking allows you to log the time spent on tasks and projects. Start the timer when you begin a task and stop it when you're done.

question: Is there a mobile app for Foxi?
reply: Yes, Foxi is available on both iOS and Android, allowing you to manage your tasks and projects on the go.

question: Can I set reminders for tasks?
reply: Yes, you can set reminders for tasks to ensure you never miss a deadline.

question: How do I invite team members to Foxi?
reply: To invite team members, go to your account settings and enter their email addresses in the team management section.

question: Can I assign tasks to other team members?
reply: Yes, you can assign tasks to team members by selecting their names from the task assignment dropdown menu.

question: What customization options are available for project management?
reply: You can customize project labels, set priority levels, and add custom fields to your projects.

question: How does Foxi handle data security?
reply: Foxi uses industry-standard encryption and security protocols to ensure your data is safe and secure.

question: Can I export my data from Foxi?
reply: Yes, you can export your data in various formats such as CSV and PDF from the account settings.

question: Is there a limit to the number of projects I can create?
reply: There is no limit to the number of projects you can create in Foxi, regardless of your subscription plan.

question: Does Foxi offer customer support?
reply: Yes, we offer 24/7 customer support via chat, email, and phone.

question: How do I enable Dark Mode?
reply: To enable Dark Mode, go to your account settings and switch to the Dark Mode option.

question: What languages is Foxi available in?
reply: Foxi is currently available in English, Spanish, French, and German.

question: Can I create recurring tasks?
reply: Yes, you can set tasks to recur daily, weekly, monthly, or at custom intervals.

question: How do I access the analytics dashboard?
reply: Access the analytics dashboard from the main menu to view reports and insights on your productivity.
